about_the_game:
Prepare for combat with the ultimate battle soundtrack. The official Ironcast soundtrack has everything any potential Commander of the Consortium of Merit would need to gear up for all-out war. Defeat your enemies in style with this dramatic, steampunk inspired orchestral masterpiece -approved and recommended for use in battle by Her Britannic Majesty Queen Victoria.

Track Listing:
  • Arundel
  • The Spire
  • Pembroke
  • Barbury
  • The Consortium
  • Dunraven
  • Warwick
  • Teuer De Reines
